meanings.definition: One of the frequency bands on either side of the carrier wave in a radio transmission.
meanings.sent1: The sideband carries additional information in a radio signal.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to tune in to the sideband for clearer reception.
meanings.sent3: The sideband whispered secrets to the carrier wave.
meanings.sent4: In the symphony of radio waves, the sideband played a harmonious tune.
meanings.sent5: The sideband hummed softly, revealing hidden messages within the transmission.

meanings.definition: A band of frequencies that are close to, but not the same as, the carrier frequency in a radio signal.
meanings.sent1: The sideband modulation technique helps in transmitting data efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The sideband interference can disrupt the clarity of the radio signal.
meanings.sent3: The sideband decided to take a detour from the carrier frequency.
meanings.sent4: Like a shadow, the sideband followed the carrier frequency closely.
meanings.sent5: Amidst the radio frequencies, the sideband stood out like a colorful ribbon.
